controls.title: Information Security Policies
controls.description: Management direction and support for information security
controls.implementationGuidance: Establish a comprehensive information security policy framework that covers all aspects of the organization's information security management system.

controls.title: Review of Information Security Policies
controls.description: Information security policies shall be reviewed at planned intervals or if significant changes occur
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement a formal process for reviewing information security policies at regular intervals and when significant changes occur.

controls.title: Information Security Roles and Responsibilities
controls.description: All information security responsibilities shall be defined and allocated
controls.implementationGuidance: Define and document information security roles and responsibilities for all personnel, including management, users, and service providers.

controls.title: Segregation of Duties
controls.description: Conflicting duties and areas of responsibility shall be segregated
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement segregation of duties to prevent conflicts of interest and reduce the risk of fraud or error.

controls.title: Contact with Authorities
controls.description: Appropriate contacts with relevant authorities shall be maintained
controls.implementationGuidance: Establish and maintain appropriate contacts with relevant authorities for information security matters.

controls.title: Contact with Special Interest Groups
controls.description: Appropriate contacts with special interest groups or other specialist security forums and professional associations shall be maintained
controls.implementationGuidance: Maintain contacts with special interest groups and professional associations to stay informed about security developments.

controls.title: Information Security in Project Management
controls.description: Information security shall be addressed in project management
controls.implementationGuidance: Integrate information security considerations into all project management activities.

controls.title: Inventory of Assets
controls.description: Assets associated with information and information processing facilities shall be identified
controls.implementationGuidance: Maintain an inventory of all information assets and assign ownership responsibilities.

controls.title: Ownership of Assets
controls.description: Assets maintained in the inventory shall be owned
controls.implementationGuidance: Assign clear ownership for all assets in the inventory and maintain ownership documentation.

controls.title: Acceptable Use of Assets
controls.description: Rules for the acceptable use of information and of assets associated with information and information processing facilities shall be identified, documented, and implemented
controls.implementationGuidance: Develop and implement clear rules for the acceptable use of information assets.

controls.title: Return of Assets
controls.description: All employees and external party users shall return all of the organization's assets in their possession upon termination of their employment, contract, or agreement
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement procedures to ensure all organizational assets are returned upon termination of employment or contracts.

controls.title: Access Control Policy
controls.description: Access control policy shall be established, documented, and reviewed
controls.implementationGuidance: Develop and maintain access control policies that define user access rights and restrictions.

controls.title: Access to Networks and Network Services
controls.description: Users shall only be provided with access to the network and network services that they have been specifically authorized to use
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement controls to ensure users only have access to authorized network services.

controls.title: Cryptographic Controls
controls.description: Appropriate use of cryptographic controls shall be ensured
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement appropriate cryptographic controls to protect information confidentiality, integrity, and authenticity.

controls.title: Key Management
controls.description: A policy on the use, protection, and lifetime of cryptographic keys shall be developed and implemented
controls.implementationGuidance: Develop and implement comprehensive key management policies and procedures.
